text: Balo -- ''amara kono adhikara ne'i amara nijera'i kono labha ba ksati karabara -- allah ya cana ta-byatita. Ara yadi ami adrsyera samyak jnana rakhatama tabe kalyanera pracurya baniye nitama, ara kono anista amake sparsa karato na. Ami to ekajana satarkakari ba'i na'i, ara ekajana susambadadata se'i lokadera jan'ya yara imana eneche.
